events.text: [color=#ffed29]("You declined our previous offer to appeal to the government to fund the apotheca’s dissection and study [b]Gungandium[/b], but I am once again offering this alternative if you do not have the time or resources to do so in the Avidine factory.")
[color=#ffed29](Oh, this is the expensive process Mr. Babinski mentioned. I guess they can appeal for the funding to get the testing done.)

[color=#ffed29](Wow, they're willing to go this far.)
[color=#ffed29](What are we doing here???)

[color=#ffed29]("You declined our previous offer to appeal to the government to fund the apotheca’s dissection and study [b]Gungandium[/b], but I am once again offering this alternative if you do not have the time or resources to do so in the Avidine factory.")

[color=#ffed29](Why doesn't Mr. Gungand say what the compound is made of?)
[color=#ffed29](Why won't he let them figure it out???)
